actions_user_actions module¶

This class wraps common user related actions for the {JSON}Placeholder API

Bases: object

Send a POST request to create a user. :type client: Session :param client: fixture to provide a persistent requests.Session :type user: dict :param user: dict generated from /models/User dataclass :type verbose: bool :param verbose: optionally suppress noisy debug prints in the log :rtype: Response :return: response.Response to the request
